segments.text: Hong , I really need to call back to the UK but I can ’ t afford to pay for the roaming charges .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , why don ’ t you use a local SIM card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Just go to the convenience store and ask for a SIM card . Then insert it into your phone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . How much will that cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well it ’ s 100 RIB for the SIM card then it will cost you about 10 RIB per minute to call the UK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that is cheap . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
